entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:54 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 09:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
